Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its high-quality features and potential impact on your business, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity tailored to your needs, considering the substantial benefits this product could bring to your organization. We are confident that it aligns with your strategic goals and can contribute to your long-term success. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to discussing how we can support your business growth together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
